TopicTitle: Epic Mission Reports MEGATHREAD post here your reports!

Articles.Content:
Hello today. Who knows about the youtuber Danny2462 and the Special Agent Kirrim series? I've obtained Kirrim Kerman and i downloaded his planes.

Mods used: Green skull Inc. (customize your kerbals)

Kethane(Not showed in photo)

And, of course The Kirrim's Plane (Manta ray Strato) The download link of the planes(see in video's description) & |youtube video(not downloadable):

(planes appear later in video).

Special Agent Kirrim somewhow he was attacked when he tried to land the plane after he destroyed the target. He jumped, and run. The plane exploded and he's all right (he has a special agent face and i put the Kerbal Space Program Logo and remove the indicators or flight GUI): Special Agent Flag(used on his suit):

Check out Danny2468's youtube channel:https://www.youtube.com/user/Danny2462

Bonus: You can post here your mission report.

The enemies are kamikazes and probes.

Damage history:

Two air intakes(right) damaged

Turbo Fan Engine(left) damaged by kamikaze

Tail Fin 1&2 damaged by probe

Delta Wing (Right) overheat+explode

Tail connector(left) dismembered

Tail connector(right) exploded

Kirrim Kerman Went on EVA and jumped

Kirrim Kerman Run

Plane Exploded

Edited April 15, 2014 by The Jeb.
I forget something

Some suggestions:

More pictures! A more detailed description makes for a more interesting read.

Don't be concerned about spelling (however, spellcheck is your friend!) or grammar, especially if English is not your first language!

(this is a guess, so if I'm wrong, please don't be offended, English is my only language and I suck at grammer.....)

So I will start off your thread. I posted these in a couple of different threads, so if you see them elsewhere, that is why.

Currently I am in the early stages of my first (hopefully) successful Joolian Mission. I will attempt to put 4 satellites in-system. Jool, Laythe, and am undecided on the last 2 at present. I am building an atmospheric lander that once used on Laythe, where it will drop its heat shielding, can be reused on the other moons as a non-atmospheric lander. I will attempt to map all planets with scansat and return safely to Kerbin.

That's the goal anyway.

Currently testing the lander (sorry, no pics yet, still in construction and design, but close to testing) but have built the transport vehicle and tested a smaller version of it to get my lifter designed an placed in the subassemblys tab where the comsats and lander will be stored as they are completed.

This is my prototype test launch. It was a 3 man crew, with a spacious cabin to make the trip bearable.

I use FAR, DR, KAS, TAC, NP, Klockheed Martin, Rollcage, LLL (antenna assemblies only), Scansat, Fusetek, Aviation Lights, Surface Lights, Kethane, Visual Enhancements, Texture Replacer, Active Texture Management, Spherical Tanks, and a few more, but those are the main ones. This test orbited the Mun, Minimus and spent a week in orbital testing as proof-of-concept.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Currently, this is the construction phase of the Main craft. I hope to be able to launch it sometime in the next few days as time permits.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

If necessary, I may send a tug with life support supplies and extra fuel to Jool to extend the mission. This is to be determined once I am certain the mission has a reasonable chance of success.

I don't have current plans for a base, but it also remains a possibility.

Sorry I don't have a full mission to start you off, but this project has already, with planning, construction and testing, exceeded 70 hours of game time.

'Splosions are the sprinkles on your ice cream sundae....Jeb

Edited April 19, 2014 by The Jeb.

Andd...... how much ram requires visual enhancements?

Mods used:

Nothing only Green skull inc replaces textures to kerbals(uninstalled in the raw photos)

Visual Enhancements isn't too bad, I can't tell you for certain, but if you use Active Texture Management it compresses all of the textures to use less memory, it will even reduce the Green Skull textures size in memory.

Although I can't give you an exact number I can give you this. I use the High Resolution Visual Enhancements and the standard (not aggressive) reduction with 44 mods and no Texture Reduction Packs. Without Active Texture Management my computer will crash on LOAD at over 3.7 GB....with ATM I am running appx 2.9 GB at load with no crashes tested up to a 600 part ship.

I tested it with Dmagics CPU test ship. I rarely crash, and when it has crashed, it has been after several hours of play and multiple ship starts. (revert, new, load new save, that type of thing)

With how few mods you are using at this time though, you could easily use it without the texture management and still be ok. Just keep track of how much ram your using after you install new mods, and if it gets close to 3, start using texture management. Depending on your computer the death point on 32 bit applications is between 3.2 and about 3.7 GB, technically, it should be 3.5 GB, but I have seen reports on hear of memory crashing as low as 3.2 GB. I think the actual number is dependent on your hardware and OS. Some just seem to hang on a bit better.

You are more than welcome to PM me with any questions, always happy to help.

Now onto your mission. MUCH BETTER! Now we have a good idea what you were doing, especially if one is not familiar with the Commander Krimm. Very nice. I would only have one additional piece of advice: Go easy on the Bold Red! Non-bolded would still get the point across, but I was nearly blinded by the gigantic bold red in the middle. I am using a 47" monitor in a darkened room, I nearly needed sunglasses, the red is ok, if used judiciously, to be less blinding. , but, this was a major improvement on your mission report. You could also of edited the first post to add photos. It would look better overall if it was all in the first post.

Hope I don't sound like a Nagging Nadia.....

Just something to think about next time. And my opinions are just that, opinions. Do not take them personally and feel free to use or not at your discretion.

On a side note, I am about to update NP, MJ, Fusetek, and I think they will break my game, so I will have to rebuild my Jool mission. Fortunately, it is still fresh in mind, and shouldn't take too long to re-create. I have good notes in physical form fortunately....just something that happens using a game in the creative (Alpha) stage, once it enters Beta, it should be better.

See ya in orbit!

Ronn "Pslytely Psycho" Kelley

'Splosions are the sprinkles on your ice cream sundae....Jeb

[Edit] I can't do splaceplanes worth a dang, I have used Tiberions Shuttle at times, but whenever I alter it or build my own, it ends in a fiery death for someone! But I do like doing Huge Lifters, Not Whackjob Huge, but really big...
